= Overview =
The *Monitor Layer* provide a set of classes to detect file system changes. The Monitor Layer is implemented using `FileSystemwatcher` from C# library. The `FileSystemWatcher` was extended to handle extra cases that the original `FileSystemWatcher` cannot handle.
